name: BI Unfuck Systemss
desc: Core engine-level fixes and overrides for BI AI behaviour, configs, and scheduling. Everything else depends on this.
video: video/Arma Reforger DCO AI - Failing hard against our AI.mp4

name: Aim correction
desc: AI will zero in on their targets over time, improving accuracy the longer they fire at a target. The zeroing process will reset if the LOS is lost for a certain time or the AI switches targets.

name: Vision Limiting
desc: AI will have a slower detection time at night and will aim less accurate in night time.

name: Individual morale
desc: The individual AIs emotional reaction to pressure such as passing bullets, near misses, near, explosions, wounds etc. Low morale will increase the chance for a soldier Systems to take cover, go prone or hide from enemy fire and do so for a longer time. Soldiers with high morale will be more aggressive, will push forward and will return fire with less chance of heading for cover.

name: Suppression
desc: AIs ability to suppress detected or identified enemies. Suppression will lower enemy accuracy and increase their chance to seek cover.

name: Basic vehicle behaviour
desc: Vehicles will detect enemies and will to positions with LOS to engage with suppression or direct fires. Vehicles will also take cover behind terrain features when threatned.

name: Danger reaction
desc: The AIs instinctual reaction to danger events such as incoming fire, explosions, wounds etc. AI reactions will range from flinching, dodging for cover, evading, going prone in the open.

name: Vocal Info sharing
desc: Soldiers ability to share info vocally about detected enemies, danger events, orders etc. within a certain radius. This will greatly battlefield awareness and responsiveness of nearby allies.

name: Radio Info sharing
desc: Squad leaders will use radio to share info about detected enemies, danger events, orders etc. with other squad leaders in the vicinity. This will greatly increase battlefield awareness and responsiveness of nearby allied squads.

name: Close combat behaviour
desc: IDLE Soldiers will prioritize using buildings as cover (not possible yet as it can not ID a building yet), if in melee range, soldier Systemss will engage in melee with the enemy. If within 50 meters from detected enemies, the soldier Systems will avoid going prone and find cover instead.

name: Tactics
desc: If no custom settings are forced, the Group leader will initiate Five types of tactics

name: IDLE behaviour
desc: A soldier that has not received a movement order in 60 seconds, will seek to spread out and take cover. If static guns are avail, AI will man them automatically. Buildings and hard structures will be prioritized as cover once BI enables ID type of cover.. There is a chance the soldier Systems will patrol the nearby area.  Will patrol within a 150 m radius around the SL

name: Emergency rearm
desc: Soldiers will pick up ammo for his rifle if available. If not, he will pick up nearby weapons that has available ammo for it.

name: CQB
desc: AI Able to do CQB and Building Assault

name: Adjust to cover
desc: AIs ability to use advanced stance adjustment to adapt to cover geometry.
